title: Fix Telegram Reflex Arc (Input -> Response Loop)
overview: The Telegram Agent receives messages (Input confirmed via logs) but does not reply (Output confirmed working via manual script). The 'Reflex Arc' connects incoming messages to System 4 (Intelligence) and routes the response back to Telegram. Currently, messages enter the system and vanish into the void.
motivation: A silent bot is indistinguishable from a broken bot. We need immediate feedback (ACK) or processing to prove the system is alive.
success_criteria: User sends 'hi' -> Bot replies (even if generic)
Errors in processing loop are logged visibly
technical_constraints: Must route through S1 -> S4 -> S1 if possible, or S1 -> Echo for testing
